long_description: The all-new Ride KS women's snowboard bindings are built for performance in the park. Featuring cushioned straps and flexible highbacks, the Ride KS bindings offer a super-smooth ride. Lightweight polycarbonate chassis feature a stance-correct heelcup for a great out-of-the-box fit. Comfortable Wedgie(TM) footbeds with EVA shock pads grip boots, damp vibrations and absorb shock from landings. Slimeback highbacks are ultralight, and offer a highly responsive and fluid feel that can handle any terrain you encounter. RAD(TM) ankle straps offer a comfortable fit for all-day shred sessions. Convertible ThinGrip toe straps with lightweight rubber webbing can be worn across the top or over the front of boots to hold you in tight; you can change positions on the fly. Durable aluminum AstroGlyde OG Ratchets buckles. Women's KS snowboard bindings are compatible with Burton The Channel snowboards, disc conversion kit is sold separately.
short_description: The all-new Ride KS women's snowboard bindings are built for performance in the park. Featuring cushioned straps and flexible highbacks, the Ride KS bindings offer a super-smooth ride.
